unnormalised: Okay, here's the celebrity gossip blog post draft:
normalised: Okay, here's the celebrity gossip blog post draft:

unnormalised: ## Chai and Celeb Spill: Did Ranbir Just...?
normalised: ## Chai and Celeb Spill: Did Ranbir Just...?

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Grab your chai and samosas, because the gossip is PIPING hot today. We're diving deep into the rumor mill, and trust me, it's juicier than a mango lassi on a hot Delhi afternoon.
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs! Grab your chai and samosas, because the gossip is piping hot today. We're diving deep into the rumor mill, and trust me, it's juicier than a mango lassi on a hot Delhi afternoon.

unnormalised: First up: Ranbir Kapoor! Remember his dreamy performance in "Rockstar"? Well, apparently, whispers are swirling that he's been spotted looking awfully cozy with… wait for it… model, Priya Sharma! Sources (aka my aunty's neighbour's dog walker) say they saw them leaving Olive Bar & Kitchen in Bandra at 2 AM last Tuesday! Is this a new romance brewing? Alia Bhatt fans, hold your horses! This is just speculation, folks, but where there's smoke, there's fire, right? Maybe he was discussing some potential collaboration for a new Dharma Productions film, but we can all dream!
normalised: First up: Ranbir Kapoor! Remember his dreamy performance in "Rockstar"? Well, apparently, whispers are swirling that he's been spotted looking awfully cozy with… wait for it… model, Priya Sharma! Sources (aka my aunty's neighbor's dog walker) say they saw them leaving Olive Bar and Kitchen in Bandra at two A M last Tuesday! Is this a new romance brewing? Alia Bhatt fans, hold your horses! This is just speculation, folks, but where there's smoke, there's fire, right? Maybe he was discussing some potential collaboration for a new Dharma Productions film, but we can all dream!

unnormalised: Then, we have Janhvi Kapoor shutting down trolls like a boss! After facing some criticism for her outfit choice at the NMACC launch (apparently it was "too revealing" according to some judgmental aunties), Janhvi responded with a sassy Instagram story, reminding everyone that it's HER body and HER choice. Yas, queen! We love a star who stands up for herself!
normalised: Then, we have Janhvi Kapoor shutting down trolls like a boss! After facing some criticism for her outfit choice at the N M A C C launch (apparently it was "too revealing" according to some judgmental aunties), Janhvi responded with a sassy Instagram story, reminding everyone that it's her body and her choice. Yas, queen! We love a star who stands up for herself!

unnormalised: Also, rumour has it that Shah Rukh Khan is planning a comeback to cricket – not on the field, of course! Speculation is that his Kolkata Knight Riders are looking to invest heavily in young talent from the MRF Pace Foundation in Chennai. So, it seems like SRK is ready to build the next generation of Indian cricketers! What a fantastic gesture!
normalised: Also, rumor has it that Shah Rukh Khan is planning a comeback to cricket – not on the field, of course! Speculation is that his Kolkata Knight Riders are looking to invest heavily in young talent from the M R F Pace Foundation in Chennai. So, it seems like S R K is ready to build the next generation of Indian cricketers! What a fantastic gesture!

unnormalised: Lastly, did you see Deepika Padukone’s airport look this week? Seriously, goals! She rocked that Sabyasachi sari like it was nobody's business.
normalised: Lastly, did you see Deepika Padukone’s airport look this week? Seriously, goals! She rocked that Sabyasachi sari like it was nobody's business.

unnormalised: That’s all for this week’s dose of celebrity masala. Keep those chais brewing and stay tuned for more updates! We'll be back next week with even more gossip that'll make you say, "Hai Rama!"
